column5: 2 additional rooms available under separate listings.   Country style home with secluded, 2 acre back yard and swimming pool near Sugar Land, TX.   Hypo-allergenic interior.   Near-zero traffic at end of a 1-mile dead end road great for walks.   TV room & desk.   Couples, solo, and business travelers (not childproofed).   6 miles to Briscoe Manor for weddings, 8 miles to private jet/helicopter facility, 15 miles to Houston's Energy Corridor. Easy access to Grand Parkway (Hwy 99).
